name: A Silly Goofy Dream
description:
This game contains swearing, player discretion is advised.

THIS GAME IS VERY FUNNY. FUNNY HAHA.

This game is about you going through your dreams, trying to figure out the point by talking to people inside of said dream.

Remember not to take this game seriously!

Try and find all the crazy and wacky characters around the 4 different maps randomly selected from every time you start!

Controls:

WASD: MOVE

SPACE BAR: JUMP

G: PUNCH

E: INTERACT
